Subject: Content Aware Protection tab missing from clients after upgrading to 3.0.4.1006
Description:
Hello,

We seem to be missing the Content Aware Protection tab after we upgraded 2 machines to the latest version from 2.7.2.3 to 3.0.4.1006. We tried both methods (Jamf upgrade/Upgrade job via EPP dashboard) but we're still missing the tab. Is this intentional? 

We also tried reinstalling the client. The client seems to be connected to the server per the timestamp. Also tried restarting the devices multiple times.

Thank you!
What_We_Know__c:
- Customer available at 12 PM CST today to join remote session
- Scheduled meeting and sent out invite
Next_Steps__c: Join remote session to look further into the issue and answer customer's questions
Solution_Comment__c:
- Content Aware Protection tab missing from clients after upgrading to 3.0.4.1006

- Assisted customer in verifying that computers experiencing the issue were added to the policy in question

- Customer now able to see CAP tab and has authorized to close case
